mapper.select: select DISTINCT s.no, s.name, s.type, s.point, s.deptcode, p.name proname, e.avgscore, l2.roomcode from subject s, professor p,lectureeval e, lectureschedule l2 where s.pfno = p.no and p.no = #{proNo} and s.seasoncode = 106 and l2.sbjno = s.no and e.avgscore is not null and e.sbjno = l2.sbjno

select DISTINCT s.no, s.name, s.type, s.point, s.deptcode, p.name proname, e.evalstate, l2.roomcode from subject s, professor p, lectureapply l, lectureeval e, lectureschedule l2 where s.no = l.sbjno and s.pfno = p.no and l.stno = #{stNo} and s.seasoncode = 106 and l.sbjno = e.sbjno and l2.sbjno = s.no
